summary: Next-Generation Trading Analytics Dashboard - Frontend Testing Complete. All major UI components verified working including dashboard loading, header controls, KPI strip, tab navigation, charts, and strategy management features. The dashboard uses real live data from MongoDB via /api/admin/trading-analytics/managers API endpoint.

issues: All strategies show 0.00% Win Rate, 0 Sharpe, 0 Total Trades - this appears to be data-related (no trades in last 30 days), not a UI bug

critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Dark luxury fintech aesthetic implemented with proper colors (deep navy, gold/cyan accents)
Typography using DM Mono for data displays, Sora/Plus Jakarta Sans for headings as specified

success_rate.backend: 100% - API /api/admin/trading-analytics/managers returns valid response with JWT auth
success_rate.frontend: 100% - All requested UI components present and functional

context_for_next_testing_agent: Trading Analytics Dashboard fully tested. All tabs (Portfolio Overview, Manager Rankings, Deep Dive, AI Advisor) working. Compare functionality verified. TradingHub Gold (#886557) defaults correctly in Deep Dive. AI Advisor tab properly disabled with 'Coming Soon' badge.

header_bar.live_clock: ✅ Displays current UTC time and updates every second

portfolio_overview_tab.risk_profile_radar: ✅ Shows Sharpe Ratio, Sortino Ratio, Win Rate, Profit Factor, Risk Control

manager_rankings_tab.leaderboard_table: ✅ Shows Rank, Strategy, Fund, AUM, P&L, Return, Sharpe, Win Rate, Max DD, Risk, Compare columns
manager_rankings_tab.compare_functionality: ✅ Compare button toggles selection, Head-to-Head panel appears

deep_dive_tab.strategy_header: ✅ Name, account number, fund, performance badge
deep_dive_tab.key_metrics: ✅ Initial Allocation, Current Equity, Total P&L, Profit Withdrawals
deep_dive_tab.risk_metrics: ✅ Sharpe Ratio, Sortino Ratio, Max Drawdown with progress bars
deep_dive_tab.trading_statistics: ✅ Total Trades, Winning/Losing Trades, Win Rate, Profit Factor, Risk Level

verified_features.api_endpoint: ✅ /api/admin/trading-analytics/managers returns data correctly with JWT auth
